sentence.Network_en: In spite of the long trip, Jody arrived looking as if she had come out of a bandbox.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然经过长途旅行, 乔迪到达的时候仍然显得神采奕奕.

sentence.Network_en: In spite of the long, hot train ride, Jane arrived looking as if a bandbox.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管坐在闷热的火车里经过长途旅行, 简到达时仍然显得干净整齐,容光焕发.
